{{cpp/experimental/ranges/range/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|experimental/ranges/range}}
{{dcl | num = 1 | since = ranges | 1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
using iterator_t = decltype(ranges::begin(std::declval&lt;T&amp;&gt;()));
}}
{{dcl | num = 2 | since = ranges | 1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
using sentinel_t = decltype(ranges::end(std::declval&lt;T&amp;&gt;()));
}}
{{dcl end}}
